prompt: How to benefit from twenty offer ?

prompt: How to activate the twenty plan ?
completion: By visiting the nearest agency or a Mobilis-authorized sales point

completion: After the plan validity expires, calls are charged from the main account Local calls: 3.98 DA / 30 sec • SMS : 5 DA/SMS •

prompt: hat are the charges for international calls and SMS & Roaming?
completion: Current rates (depending on the destination) International SMS: 14 DA / SMS

prompt: What are the rates for international calls and SMS, and for roaming?
completion: The current applicable rates (depending on the destination) • International SMS: 14 DZD per SMS

prompt: What is the purchase price of the Sama sim card?
completion: At a price of 200 DA / TTC , you can acquire the new Sama prepaid offer, available at Mobilis agencies and authorized points of sale, accompanied by a welcome bonus as follows: 100 DA of credi t

prompt: How to acquire the Sama offer?
completion: By going to the nearest agency or to an approved Mobilis point of sale to take advantage of the new Sama prepaid offer

prompt: What is the price of calls out of plan?
completion: The taxation of out-of-plan calls to all networks nationwide is: 3.98 DA / 30 seconds

prompt: What is the price of SMS out of plan?
completion: The taxation of out-of-plan SMS to all networks nationwide is: 5 DA / SMS

prompt: How to activate Sama plans ?
completion: : L’activation se fait via les différents canaux Menu : *600# Application : MobiSpace Interface web : https://meetmob.mobilis.dz Nos agences

prompt: Is it possible to migrate to the Sama offer?
completion: Migration to Sama is available at Mobilis commercial agencies

prompt: Can I go back to my previous offer?
completion: You cannot go back to your initial offer after migrating

prompt: What are the offers available in the Sama Libre range?
completion: You can activate additional internet passes via the *600# menu, the Meetmob website, or the Mobispace app. This option is only available for Sama Libre 1500 and 2000 plans

prompt: What happens when I run out of my included internet data in the offer?
completion: Once you have exhausted your internet volume on Sama Libre 1300, 1500, and 2000 plans, you can benefit from unlimited Facebook until the end of the plan validity, and you can also purchase additional internet packages

prompt: How can I activate additional internet passes on Sama Libre plans?
completion: You can activate additional internet passes via the *600# menu, the Meetmob website, or the Mobispace app. This option is only available for Sama Libre 1500 and 2000 plans

prompt: How are out-of-bundle calls and SMS to national networks charged?
completion: Out-of-bundle calls to national networks are charged at a rate of 2.5 Algerian Dinars per 30 seconds, and each SMS costs 5 Algerian Dinars

prompt: How are out-of-bundle calls and SMS to national networks charged?
completion: Out-of-bundle calls to national networks are charged at a rate of 2.5 DZD per 30 seconds, and each SMS costs 5 DZD

prompt: What is the cost of out-of-bundle SMS to international destinations?
completion: Each SMS sent to an international destination is charged 14 DZD out of bundle

prompt: How are value-added services billed?
completion: The activation fees for value-added services are charged out-of-bundle and added to your bill, according to the current rates

prompt: How often am I billed for the Sama Libre offers?
completion: Billing for Sama Libre offers is bimonthly, which means you will receive a bill every two months

prompt: What are the available channels to recharge my account or pay my bill?
completion: You can recharge your account or pay your bill via: Arselli / E-rselli : e-paiement.mobilis.dz Algeria Post branches and automated teller machines Algeria Post's mobile application BaridiMob Mobilis recharge cards

prompt: How to access the different passes?
completion: You can buy optional passes via the following channels Menu *600# Commercial Agencies https://meetmob.mobilis.dz Web Interface MobiSpace App

prompt: Are the passes cumulative?
completion: Optional passes are cumulative and the consumption logic is based on the shortest validity

prompt: What offers are included in the Navigo pass ?
completion: Subscribers to the Navigui 4G / 3G offer

prompt: How to get the Navigo pass?
completion: You can buy optional passes to connect via *600#

prompt: Are the passes cumulative?
completion: Optional passes can be accumulated and the consumption logic follows the shortest validity period

prompt: How can I benefit from the MobSound service?
completion: Download the MobSound app via Google Play or from the following link : c https://mobsound.mobilis.dz Enter your Mobilis phone number Enter the verification code received by SMS !Enjoy all the music you love

prompt: How do I disable the MobSound service?
completion: Send DES by SMS to 441 Dial *154# Or via MobSound: open the app, go to "My Account," then "My Subscription," and press "Disable Service"

prompt: What are the existing plans of MobSound service?
completion: You can choose from one of the following plans to fully enjoy the « MobSound » application Daily plan: 50 DA Weekly plan: 100 DA Monthly plan: 250 DA

prompt: What are the benefits of the MobSound service?
completion: Listen to all the tracks of your choice Listen to downloaded songs even without a connection Discover new releases Search by artists, songs, albums Download music to the application Enjoy superior sound quality Create playlists Share tracks on social networks

prompt: How does the Mobinfo work ?
completion: Dial *620# and choose one of the three options Monthly subscription On-demand service Oum Walid's recipes

prompt: What are the bouquets offered by Mobinfo service?
completion: Woman Foot Practical entertainment knowledge news

prompt: What is the keyword per cluster of Mobinfo?
completion: Woman : ( Arabe AR + F / Français FR + F) 50.86 DA TTC to cancel : DES F Foot : ( Arabe AR + S / Français FR + S) 50.86 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES S Practice : ( Arabe N° de wilaya+ AR +P / Français N° de wilaya+ FR +U) 50.86 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES P Entertainment : ( Arabe AR + D / Français FR + D) 25.43 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES D Culture : ( Arabe AR + C / Français FR + C) 50.86 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES C Economic information : ( Arabe AR + E / Français FR + E) 50.86 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES E News : ( Arabe AR + I / Français FR + I) 25.43 DA TTC Pour Annuler : DES I

prompt: What are the keywords for on-demand bouquets of Mobinfo?
completion: well-being : BE+ AR ou FR Beauty and Fashion Tips : BM+ AR ou FR Mom : MM+ AR ou FR Rrecipe : R + AR ou FR Boukalat : B+ AR ou FR Weather : M + AR ou FR + N° wilayas Joke : BL + AR ou FR Proverb : P + AR ou FR Tips and Tricks : T+AR ou FR Good Deal : BP+AR ou FR Vidéo Game Release : J+AR ou FR Algerian and African Football : FA+AR ou FR International Football : FI+AR ou FR National Team : EN+AR ou FR Science & High-tech : HT+AR ou FR Music : ZIK+AR ou FR Books : L+AR ou FR Cinéma : CIN+AR ou FR

prompt: How to subscribe to a monthly plan of Mobinfo?
completion: To subscribe to a monthly plan, dial *620# and choose the monthly subscription option. Then, select your desired information package and the reception language

prompt: How to request information on demand in Mobinfo?
completion: To request information on demand, send an SMS containing a keyword to the number 620. Choose from the available keywords to get information on various topics

prompt: How much does the Mobinfo service cost?
completion: The cost of the service depends on the chosen option: the monthly subscription is billed at 25.43 DZD/TTC or 50.86 DZD/TTC depending on the chosen package, while the on-demand service is billed at 10.17 DA/TTC

prompt: How can I deactivate the Mobinfo service?
completion: If you wish to deactivate the Mobinfo service, you can do so by dialing *620# or *154#  and following the instructions to deactivate the service

prompt: How can I benefit from the Mobmic service?
completion: By dialing *682# • By sending an SMS to 680 ( Free SMS) • Via the portal: mobmic.mobilis.dz •

prompt: How much does the Mobmic service cost?
completion: Monthly subscription to the service is billed at 40 DA i30 free messages/month, beyond each modified message is taxed at 05 DA The number 682 is taxed at 05 DA

prompt: What are the useful keywords for the Mobmic service?
completion: Here are some features available with MobMic and their associated keywords: ﻿Subscribe to the service : INS Help : INF Change message : CH + texte ° Copy message : CS N Check current message : SPD Unsubscribe : DES Set a nicknam : PS pseudo Add a number to the blacklist : BL + phone number Add a number to the whitelisr : WL + phone number Remove a number from the blacklist : SBL + phone number A number from the whitelist : SWL + phone number

prompt: How can I unsubscribe from the Mobmic service?
completion: You can unsubscribe from the MobMic service by using the *682# menu on your phone or by sending an SMS containing "DES" to 682 or dial *154#

prompt: How to take advantage of Men3andi service?
completion: Dial *618# to access the menu choose the language Create a list of 10 favorite numbers Once you've created your list, you can manage calls from these numbers, even when you're unavailable

prompt: How to use Men3andi service?
completion: The use of the Men3andi service must be done by the prefix *6 followed by the subscriber number Example : By calling: 06 XX XX XX XX, Men3andi call *6 06XX XX XX XX The call rate (charged) is 4 DA / 30 sec

prompt: What is the cost of the covered call in Men3andi service?
completion: The cost of a call handled by the Men3andi service is 04 DZD for every 30 seconds

prompt: How do I deactivate the Men3andi service?
completion: To deactivate the Men3andi service, simply remove the numbers from the list you initially created

prompt: How to benefit from the kellemni service?
completion: : To use this service, you just need to dial the following formula *606 * mobile number of your contact # then ok ”Your contact will receive a SMS with the message “call me

prompt: What are the Terms of Use of kellemni ?
completion: Prepaid subscribers can benefit from the Kellemni service when their credit is less than or equal to 3 DA for 7 days and can send 5 messages per day. After 7 days   they will be invited to recharge their account to continue enjoying the service

prompt: How much does kellemni cost ?
completion: The service is free of charge and there are no additional fees

prompt: How to benefit from the Sellekni service?
completion: Dial *665# Subscribe to the service. You will receive an SMS containing your password Dial *665# again Choose Sellekni Plan or Sellekni Net Enter the number of the person you want to transfer the offer to This person must be on the Sama or Mobtasim PixX offer : r Enter your password Select the Plan or Pass to transfer

prompt: What are the terms and conditions of use Sellekni service ?
completion: Sama Offer : The number of transactions and the amount of plans transferred are not limited PixX & Win Max Control Offers : The number and amount of transactions are limited as follows : Sellekni Plan : The total amount of transactions authorized per day is Two Thousand Dinars ( 2000 DA / TTC ) The maximum number of transactions authorized per month is Five (05) Sellekni Net : The total amount of transactions authorized per day is One Thousand Dinars ( 1000 DA / TTC ) The maximum number of transactions authorized per month is Five (05)

prompt: What is the pricing of the Sellekni service?
completion: The price of the transaction is 10 DA / TTC + the amount of the Plan orInternet Pass purchased

prompt: What data can be backed up in MyCloud?
completion: Contacts Photos Videos Documents

prompt: How do I access the data in MyCloud?
completion: : Access to the myCloud service is available through myCloud Mobilis application via Google Play Website https://mycloud.mobilis.dz As with most services, myCloud requires you to be logged into a user account Customers can register by entering their phone number and a password

prompt: What are the adopted rates for using MyCloud?
completion: Directory backup level at 50 DZD • level 5 GB at 150 DZD Per month level 10 GB at 250 DZD Per month level 25 GB at 400 DZD Per month

prompt: What is the data retention policy for My Cloud?
completion: Upon expiration of the subscription validity period, subscribers will benefit from a 90-day grace period during which their data will be retained solely for consultation purposes. After this period, the customer and their data will be completely deleted from the service's database

prompt: How does the MobiliS@fe service work?
completion: To use MobiliS@fe, parents must subscribe to a 12-month subscription at a cost of 800 DZD (including tax). Subscriptions can only be purchased at Mobilis retail outlets, where parents must present a valid ID

prompt: How can parents activate parental controls?
completion: Parents can activate parental control by visiting a Mobilis commercial agency and subscribing to the service.

prompt: What are the benefits of MobiliS@fe?
completion: Protection against inappropriate, violent, or shocking content

prompt: What is the price of the service MobiliS@fe?
completion: The MobiliS@fe service has a 12-month validity period and is taxed at 800 DZD (including taxes) as follows: • Prepaid subscribers will be charged 800 DA (including taxes) from their accounts for the service fee. • Postpaid subscribers will have an additional 800 DA (including taxes) added to their bills. This amount represents the service fee

prompt: How to benefit from Sama?
completion: Visit the nearest agency or an authorized Mobilis point of sale present your valid ID and 200 DA purchase fee enjoy a welcome bonus of 100 DA credit

prompt: How to activate Sama Talk, Net, and Mix plans?
completion: You can activate the plans at any time through the following channels Menu: *600# Application: MobiSpace Web interface: https://meetmob.mobilis.dz Commercial Agencies POS Points of Sale

prompt: What is the Sama Control offer?
completion: The Sama Control offer from Mobilis is a comprehensive telecommunications solution that provides integrated packages including call minutes, SMS, and data, all in different tiers to suit the varied needs of users

prompt: Where can I get the Sama Control offer?
completion: This offer is available in all Mobilis agencies and authorized sales points. You can easily subscribe to the Sama Control 1500 offer at any of these points

prompt: What are the rates for the Sama Control offer (voice, SMS, out-of-bundle)?
completion: Within the package: Calls to all national networks: 10 DA/minute SMS to all national networks: 5 DA/SMS Outside the package: Calls to all national networks: 3 DA/30 seconds SMS to all national networks: 5 DA/SMS SMS to international: 15 DA/SMS

prompt: What is the subscription price for this package?
completion: The SIM activation fee is completely free. You only pay the amount corresponding to the package tier you choose

prompt: How can I renew my subscription?
completion: By dialing *600#, you can access a menu that allows you to renew your monthly subscription or activate internet passes only, international or roaming, once the required amount has been recharged

prompt: Can I make international calls with the Sama Control offer?
completion: Yes, you can make international calls using your current balance according to the applicable rates

prompt: Can I make calls while roaming?
completion: If you are traveling, you can activate roaming plans by dialing *600# or by using the web interface at Meetmob.mobilis.dz or MobiSpace

prompt: Can I activate Value Added Services (VAS)?
completion: Yes, you can subscribe to all Value Added Services such as Naghmati, MobMic, etc. The cost of these services will be deducted from your main account

prompt: If I have a prepaid offer, can I activate one of the Sama Control plans?
completion: The mentioned packages are exclusively dedicated to the Sama Control offer and its different levels. To benefit from them, you must acquire this offer by visiting a Mobilis agency

prompt: On which day will I receive my Sama Control package?
completion: You benefit from the offer advantages immediately after paying for the package corresponding to the chosen level, and this for a period of 30 days

prompt: What happens if I do not renew my package after its expiration date?
completion: In case of non-renewal of your subscription on the expiration date, outgoing calls from your line will be blocked

prompt: What are the main benefits of the Twenty Premium offer?
completion: The Twenty Premium offer includes unlimited calls and SMS to all national networks, 2000 DZD of credit for international calls, and 200 GB of unlimited internet, with reduced speed after the quota is exhausted

prompt: How can I renew my Twenty Premium plan?
completion: You can renew your plan at any time through various channels: by dialing *600#, using the MobiSpace app, on the Mobilis website, or by visiting a retail store.

prompt: What happens once I reach the 200 GB internet quota?
completion: Once you reach your 200 GB data limit, you can continue to browse the internet at a reduced speed without any service interruption.

prompt: What are the international call rates with the Twenty Premium plan?
completion: ou benefit from 2000 DA of international credit to make international calls at preferential rates. For more details on the destinations covered, please visit https://website.atmmobilis.local/international?type=Internationalplan

prompt: If I have a prepaid offer, can I switch to the Twenty Premium offer?
completion: Yes, you can benefit from this offer, but only by going to a Mobilis agency.

prompt: On what day will I receive my Twenty Premium plan?
completion: You will benefit from the offer immediately after paying for the package, and this for a period of 30 days

prompt: What happens if I don't renew my plan after its expiration date?
completion: If you do not renew your plan by the expiration date, your line will be blocked for outgoing calls

prompt: What is the Navigui offer?
completion: The Navigui SIM Internet is designed for users who want to enjoy mobile internet at competitive rates, with an attractive welcome bonus upon activation.

prompt: What is the price of the Navigui SIM?
completion: The Navigui SIM is available for 300 DA.

prompt: What benefits do I get upon activation?
completion: When you activate your Navigui SIM, you will receive: ✅ 3GB of free internet, valid for 30 days ✅ Free access to Facebook and WhatsApp for 30 days

prompt: How do I activate my Navigui SIM?
completion: Your SIM card activates automatically as soon as you insert it into your phone. Simply connect to the internet for the first time to receive your welcome bonus.

prompt: How can I check my internet balance?
completion: You can check your remaining internet balance by dialing *222#.

prompt: What happens after the bonus expires?
completion: After 30 days, your welcome bonus will expire. To continue browsing, you can purchase    one of the following internet plans via *600# 10GB, valid for 30 days, for 1000 DA✅ 25GB, valid for 30 days, for 2000 DA✅ 80GB, valid for 3 months, for 6000 DA✅ 300GB, valid for 6 months, for 15000 DA✅

prompt: Can I use this SIM for calls and SMS?
completion: No, the Navigui SIM is dedicated exclusively to internet use and does not allow voice calls or SMS.

prompt: Where can I buy the Navigui SIM?
completion: You can purchase it from any authorized Mobilis store.

prompt: Can I share my internet connection with another device (Hotspot mode)?
completion: Yes, you can share your internet connection with other devices by enabling the Hotspot feature on your phone.

prompt: Who can benefit from the Pack Navigui 4G offer?
completion: The offer is available to all customers, whether new or existing, who wish to benefit from a stable and fast connection via modem 4G.

prompt: Does the offer include a modem and a SIM card?
completion: Yes, the offer includes the modern INATEL M50 modem, equipped with an activated Navigui 4G SIM card, ready for use.

prompt: What are the details of the welcome gift?
completion: Once the offer is activated, you get 3 GB plus free access to WhatsApp and Facebook apps, valid for 30 days.

prompt: How long does the 5 GB monthly validity last?
completion: You get 5 GB monthly for 6 months. After consuming the monthly allowance, you can continue Browse with unlimited internet.

prompt: Is the offer permanently available?
completion: The offer is available only while supplies last.

prompt: Where can I buy the Navigui 4G Pack?
completion: You can get it from the nearest Mobilis commercial agency.

prompt: How can I benefit from the service Racidi?
completion: To check your CCP balance, send an SMS to 603 with your CCP number (without the key) followed by a space and your confidential code: You will instantly receive an SMS containing -Your CCP number -Your balance amount -The date of the last update

prompt: What is the cost of the service?
completion: The service is free of charge. However, the SMS sent to 603 will be charged at the standard rate of 5 DZD/SMS

prompt: How does call forwarding work?
completion: To activate call forwarding:"Select the "Settings" menu, "Call settings" or "Call configuration Choose "Call forwarding" Then select the type of forwarding (Unconditional, if unreachable; on no answer, if busy) Enter the forwarding number, then validate

prompt: How to manage call forwarding without going through my phone menu ?
completion:
Unconditional call forwarding
 Activate: 21*644# ok
 Deactivation: ##21#
-Call forwarding if unreachable
Activate: 62*644# ok
Deactivation: ##62#
Call forwarding if busy
Activate: 67*644# ok
Deactivation: ##67#
Call forwarding if no answer
Activate: 61*644# ok
Deactivation: ##61#

prompt: How to Deactivate Call Forwarding ?
completion: You can simply cancel call forwarding from your mobile phone's menu, or by using the call forwarding codes. (See the short codes for deactivating the different call forwarding options in the Call Forwarding section.) Or by dialing the code ##002# to cancel all call forwarding

prompt: How to Use Mobilis Voice mail ?
completion: When you use your voicemail for the first time, you will be guided through a setup process that will allow you to Choose your language Set your password Configure your voicemail

prompt: How do I activate call forwarding to my voicemail ?
completion: You can simply set up a call forwarding to 699 for free, depending on the type of call forwarding you want (busy, unreachable, unconditional, no answer),  using the corresponding abbreviated codes

prompt: What are the call forwarding codes ?
completion: Unconditional Call Forwarding : **21*699# ok Deactivation : ##21# Call Forwarding if Unreachable : **62*699# ok Deactivation : ##62# Call Forwarding if Busy : **67*699# ok Deactivation : ##67# Call Forwarding if No Answer : **61*699# ok Deactivation : ##61#

prompt: How to check your voicemail messages ?
completion: To check your messages, simply call 123 from your Mobilis line You can also check it from another Mobilis line by calling 124 or from another operator by calling 0660 600 124 When you receive a voicemail message, you will be sent an SMS notification

prompt: How to disable my voicemail ?
completion: You can disable voicemail by canceling call forwarding from your phone's menu or by using the corresponding forwarding codes. You can also dial ##002# to cancel all forwarding

prompt: What are the voicemail settings?
completion: Message duration: 60 seconds Number of messages stored: 10 text messages / for 8 Number of saved messages: 5 text messages

prompt: How much is it?
completion: Call forwarding to voice mail: Free • Checking a Mobilis line: Free • Checking 123: 3.98 DA / 30 sec • Leaving a message: 3.98 DA / 30 sec •

prompt: what is the notification service?
completion: The Mobilis Availability Notifications service allows you to send an automatic SMS to all contacts who tried to reach you when you were unavailable.

prompt: How can I activate the notification service for all numbers?
completion: Dial *644# "Choose  " Activate service " Choose "For all numbers To finalize activation, dial *62 * 644#

prompt: How can I activate the notification service for specific numbers only?
completion: Dial *644# Choose 1 “Activate the service” Choose 2 “Authorized numbers” Enter the Mobilis number to authorize To complete the activation of the service, you must dial *62*644#

prompt: How to deactivate the notification service?
completion: : To deactivate the service, please follow the steps below Dial *644# Choose "Deactivate the service" Choose "confirm the operation"

prompt: How much does the notification service cost?
completion: The service is free and without additional charges

prompt: How to benefit from the Naghmati service?
completion: : Access and use of the service are available through all channels By calling 680 • By dialling *680# • By visiting http://680.mobilis.dz/portal/#!/home • By sending keywords by SMS to 680 ( Free SMS ) •

prompt: How much does the Naghmati subscription cost?
completion: Monthly subscription (automatically renewable): 40.69 DA Tone download: 50.86 DA / 60 days Box download: 50 DA / 30 days Call to 680: 10.16 DA / min SMS to 680: 5.08 DA

prompt: What are the useful codes for Naghmati service?
completion: : Useful codes that can be sent by SMS to 680 Subscribing to the service : INS Unsubscribing from the servic : DES Activating the service : ACT Downloading a tone : TEL TONE CODE / EX: TEL 201303 Renewing a tone : RNV TONE CODE / EX: RNV 201303 Setting a default tone : DEF TONE CODE / EX: DEF 201303 Deleting a tone : DEL TONE CODE / EX: DEL 201303 Giving a tone as a gift : KDO TONE CODE / EX: KDO 201303 Browsing your personal library : TON Getting your password : MP Help : AIDE

prompt: Can I assign purchased tones?
completion: From the web portal http://naghmati.mobilis.dz You can assign your purchased tones to all callers, a group of friends or a single caller

prompt: Can we select a tone relative to a specific time ?
completion: You can also select a tone based on the time of day, a special date (event, birthday, etc.), or the days of the week. For example, you could use a specific tone every weekend, or from January 1st to December 31st between 9:00 AM and 7:00 PM

prompt: How can I deactivate the Naghmati service?
completion: Dial *680# Send an SMS with the word "DES" to 680 Or dial *154#

prompt: How to use mobilistore services on an Android smartphone ?
completion: Log in to http://store.mobilis.dz from your mobile phone : Download the MobiliStore app , then you can Download and install the game you have chosen

prompt: How to use mobilistore services on a feature phone ?
completion: : You will be able to download paid java games following these step : s Create or log in to your user account (already registered) Log in to http://wap.store.mobilis.dz Enter your phone number, username, and password, or click on the register icon

prompt: How to buy games from mobilistore?
completion: Select a game Click on the price icon to download the game Confirm the payment Install your game after downloading

prompt: How much does games in mobilistore cost ?
completion: Games can be free or paid between 30 DA and 200 DA depending on the game chosen

prompt: What is the Android VIP Club?
completion: Go to the URL http://store.mobilis.dz or access the MobiliStore application : Buy a game : e Download a game Install the game after downloading Open the game application: you will have the choice to join the VIP Club or buy the game Purchase of optional features on the application: You will be able to purchase additional paid features on downloaded games By subscribing to the Android VIP Club, you can benefit from unlimited free game downloads and discounts of up to 80% on the purchase of optional features Daily VIP Club : 30.51 DA TTC valid for 1 day Weekly VIP Club : 101.71 DA TTC valid for 7 days Monthly VIP Club : 254.27 DA TTC valid for 30 days Mobilis offers you a three-day free trial for your first subscription, after which you will be charged according to the chosen plan

prompt: How does the Cridilis service work?
completion: You can have: 20 DA / 50 DA / 100 DA :To use the Cridilis service, the following conditions must be met Have a SIM card activated for more than 6 months A consumption higher than 3000 DA during the last 6 months Have a balance below 3.98 DA Have no unpaid borrowed amount

prompt: How can I use the Cridilis service?
completion: To use Cridilis by dialing for free *662*3* the amount # EX: *662*3*100# #To check the authorized loan amounts, dial: *662 *2 To check the history of transactions made (loan amount), dial: *662*2#

prompt: What are the fees for the Cridilis service?
completion: Amount: 20 DA • Amount to be repaid: 30 DA Amount: 50 DA • Amount to be repaid: 60 DA Amount: 100 DA • Amount to be repaid: 110 DA The service fee is 10 DA + the amount borrowed, which will be automatically deducted from your next recharge.

prompt: Who is the Cridilis service for?
completion: The service is only available to prepaid subscribers

prompt: What is servise?
completion:
As part of its ongoing commitment to enhancing the digital experience of its customers, Mobilis is offering Internet data to its prepaid subscribers. For every electronic top-up of 1,000 DZD or more, receive 5 GB of free data, valid for 48 hours! 
 Offer available through the following recharge channels:
✔ E-rselli via the link: http://e-paiement.mobilis.dz
✔ BaridiMob
✔ Wimpay-BNA
✔ ATMs

prompt: What is WIMPAY-BNA?
completion: WIMPAY-BNA is a new mobile application designed to allow subscribers to recharge their Mobilis accounts or pay their bills with ease, speed, and security

prompt: Where can I download the WIMPAY-BNA app?
completion: The WIMPAY-BNA app is available on Google Play and the App Store

prompt: How can I subscribe to the WIMPAY-BNA service?
completion: : To subscribe to the WIMPAY-BNA service, simply follow these steps Download the WIMPAY-BNA mobile app "Open the app and click on "Subscribe Enter your Mobilis phone number and your email address A confirmation code will be sent to your phone number. Enter the code in the app Create a password and confirm it You are now subscribed to the WIMPAY-BNA service

prompt: How can I recharge my Mobilis account via WIMPAY-BNA ?
completion: To recharge your Mobilis prepaid or postpaid account via WIMPAY BNA , follow these step : For all main account recharges Enter your phone number Select the recharge amount from the suggested amounts or enter the recharge amount by selecting "Other." Confirm the amount and enter the security code of the application chosen by the customer After verifying the payment, the amount will be debited from the customer's BNA account. Your Mobilis account will be recharged instantly

prompt: How can I pay my Mobilis bill via WIMPAY-BNA ?
completion: To pay your Mobilis postpaid bill via WIMPAY-BNA , follow these steps Enter your phone number and customer account number Select the bill you want to pay Confirm the amount and enter the security code of the application chosen by the customer After validation of the payment, the amount will be deducted from the customer's BNA account A confirmation will be displayed (online payment receipt) and can be downloaded

prompt: What are the fees for the WIMPAY-BNA service ?
completion: There are no fees for using the WIMPAY-BNA service

prompt: How to use the Arsselli service via BardiMob?
completion: To use the Arsselli service via BardiMob , follow these steps Download the BardiMob app Sign up for the BardiMob service on the Algérie Poste website www.poste.dz In the app, enter your phone number, card number, and card expiration date Select the "Payments" section "Select "Mobile Recharge " Select "Mobilis " Click on "Source of the transaction Enter your phone number and amount " Click on "Continue Click on "Get the confirmation code" and enter the code received by SMS Confirm the transaction After confirming the payment, the amount will be debited from your CCP account A downloadable confirmation will be displayed (online payment receipt) or sent by email

prompt: What is the minimum transaction amount in Arsselli service via BardiMob?
completion: The minimum transaction amount is 100 DA

prompt: How much does the Arsselli service via BardiMob cost?
completion: The service is free, only the amount recharged is deducted from your CCP account

prompt: Formelle What are the features of the Arsselli service via BardiMob?
completion: Top up your Mobilis account : Recharge your prepaid or postpaid account in just a few clicks Pay your Mobilis bills : Pay your postpaid bills without having to go to a branch Save time and money : No more long queues and tedious trips Easy to use : Intuitive and user-friendly interface for an optimal experience Maximum security : Your transactions are secured by the most advanced encryption technologies Payment via CCP : Use your CCP account to make your top-ups and payments securely

prompt: How does the Arsselli service via poste work?
completion: To recharge at post offices, the customer must follow the following : steps Go to the nearest post office - -Give the customer service representative your phone number and   full name : Select the type of recharge - Credit recharge International credit recharge Bill payment Give the customer service representative the amount - Make sure you receive the payment receipt and the SMS -notification for the transaction

prompt: How to use the Arsselli service via ATM?
completion: To use the Arsselli service via ATM, the customer will need to follow the following steps Access the ATM menu: Insert your EDAHABIA card and enter your PIN • Select the "Mobile Recharge" tab • Enter the phone number to be recharged • Enter the recharge amount • Confirm the number to be recharged and the amount • Print the ticket • Once validated, the Mobilis number will receive the recharged amount on its line

prompt: What is the price of the Arsselli service via ATM?
completion: The service is free, only the recharged amount will be deducted from the client’s CCP account

prompt: What is roaming?
completion: Roaming is a service that allows you to use your Mobilis SIM card abroad. It enables you to make and receive calls, send SMS, and connect to the internet using the network of a Mobilis partner internationally.

prompt: How can I activate the roaming service?
completion: The service is activated by default for Prepaid and Control subscribers; you simply need to recharge your account to benefit from it. You can also activate roaming packages via *600#. For Postpaid subscribers, roaming service activation must be done at a Mobilis agency Also, make sure to enable the "Data roaming" option in your phone's network settings

prompt: What should I do once I'm abroad?
completion: Your phone will automatically connect to the Mobilis partner network in the country you are in. You can also connect manually through your phone's network settings.

prompt: How can I make calls from abroad?
completion: When making calls, please use the country code of the person you are calling. Examples: • Algeria: +213 662 XX XX XX • Tunisia: +216 XXX XX XX XX

prompt: Who is concerned?
completion: All prepaid subscribers & 3G & 4G monitoring Enterprise subscribers: Sky Business

prompt: What is kellemni service?
completion: This service allows you to reach your loved ones even when you have no credit or insufficient credit. It is a free service available for both prepaid and postpaid lines.

prompt: How can I call when I have no credit or balance?
completion: Kellemni allows you to request a call from another Mobilis user when you have insufficient credit.

prompt: I want to play games on my phone
completion: You can use the Mobilistore service, which offers a wide range of mobile games, both free and paid. Simply search for your favorite game in the app and select 'Download.'

prompt: I want to customize my call waiting tone
completion: You can use the Naghmati service to personalize your call waiting tone. For only 40 DA per month, you can choose from a large group of ringtones that reflect your personality.

prompt: I want to receive daily news and updates on my phone
completion: You can subscribe to MobInfo. Dial *620# to receive SMS updates on cultural, sports, economic, weather, and other topics of your choice.

prompt: I want to send a message to my contacts during a call
completion: You can use the Mobmic service, which allows you to automatically display a personalized message on the screen of your contacts during a call.

prompt: I want to forward my calls to another number
completion: You can use the Call Forwarding service to forward your calls to a landline, another mobile number, or voicemail.

prompt: I want to manage my voicemail when I can't answer calls
completion: You can activate the Voicemail service. It allows you to customize your greeting and manage your voicemails easily when you're unavailable.

prompt: I want people to know when I'm available again after missing calls
completion: You can use the Notifications service. It automatically sends an SMS to contacts who tried to reach you when you were unavailable.

prompt: I don't have enough credit to make a call
completion: You can use the Cridilis service, which provides you with an emergency loan to help you stay connected when your balance is low.

prompt: I want to offer or transfer a plan to my friend or family
completion: You can use the Sellekni service. It allows you to offer and transfer Sama & Pixx plans to your loved ones.

prompt: I want to recharge my account or pay my bills easily
completion: You can use the WIMPAY-BNA application to recharge your account or pay your bills with ease, speed, and security.

prompt: Which Mobilis plan offers the most internet data?
completion:
The **Twenty Premium** control plan offers the most internet data with **200GB per month** for 4000DA. This plan also includes:
- Unlimited calls and SMS to Mobilis and other networks
- 2000 DZD credit for international calls

The second-highest data allowances are found in both Sama Libre postpaid and Sama Control plans at the 3500DA/month tier, offering **150GB internet** each.

prompt: What is the daily plan available at Mobilis?
completion:
The cheapest daily plan at Mobilis is the **Sama Net plan** for **30DA/24H**, which includes:
- 300MB internet
- WhatsApp + Facebook access

There's also an **Internet Pass** for the same price (30DA/24H) that offers:
- 300MB internet
- WhatsApp + Facebook access
- Compatible with Sama Libre, Sama Control, Win Max Libre, Win Max Control, Beking, and PixX offers

prompt: How much does it cost to get unlimited calls to all networks with Mobilis?
completion:
For unlimited calls to **all networks**, Mobilis offers:

**Prepaid:**
- **Twenty plan**: 2000DA/month - includes 80GB internet + unlimited calls and SMS to all networks

**Control:**
- **Twenty Premium**: 4000DA/month - includes 200GB internet + unlimited calls and SMS to all networks + 2000 DZD for international calls

Note: Most other plans offer unlimited calls only to Mobilis network, with credits or limited hours for calls to other networks.
